title: Recent Changes/Reasons for Traffic Laws Quiz

questions.question: Any Driver who is suspected of driving under the influence of drugs will be required to take a blood test to determine drug content unless:
questions.explaination: The answer is c.  Both persons who are hemophiliacs and those taking prescribed anti-coagulate narcotics for a heart condition can be exempt from taking a blood test when suspected of driving under the influence.

questions.question: The number one objective of traffic laws is to prevent collisions, deaths and injuries.
questions.explaination: The correct answer is a. This statement is true.  The main priority of traffic laws is to prevent collisions responsible for deaths and injuries.

questions.question: The minimum distance for vehicles passing bikes is changing to:
questions.explaination: The correct answer is a. A new law states that the minimum passing distance for vehicles passing bikes is 3 feet.
